title: List of all Androidfile picker   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidfile picker   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: MultiType-FilePicker
repoList.description: This is a light Android file picker library.

repoList.name: NoNonsense-FilePicker
repoList.description: A file/directory-picker for android. Implemented as a library project.

repoList.name: FilePicker
repoList.description: FilePicker library for Android

repoList.name: ExFilePicker
repoList.description: Open source Android library. Implement choosing files and directories in your application.

repoList.name: FilePickerLibrary
repoList.description: Simple library that allows for the picking of files and/or directories.

repoList.name: android-folder-picker-library
repoList.description: A light-weight (just 27 KB) android library to let users choose folder / files.

repoList.name: ChiliPhotoPicker
repoList.description: Photo picker library for android. Let's you pick photos directly from files, or navigate to camera or gallery.

repoList.name: FilePicker
repoList.description: Android Library to select files/directories from Device Storage.

repoList.description: Android library for pick file and folder
